milestones.description: de Silva has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (6) for SL, going past Tony Opatha
Warnapura and Wettimuny's 34-run partnership is SL's highest for the 1st wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 31 between Wettimuny and Warnapura
Madugalle and Ranasinghe's 68-run partnership is SL's highest for the 6th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 11 between Pasqual and de Silva
de Silva and Ranasinghe's 15-run partnership is SL's highest for the 7th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 11 between Mevan Pieris and Tony Opatha
